g.text: Curated expert network delivering full-service digital solutions for US & global clients
Client challenges are a window into real market demand.
Recurring client pain points reveal gaps in the app market we can fill ourselves
Cross-industry exposure shapes how we approach product design and UX
Client tech stacks and integration patterns accelerate our own build velocity
Client pain points become product opportunities.
Diverse client data is the fuel that makes Growlytics smarter.
Data from 12+ industries trains a more generalized, robust AI analytics engine
Real strategy engagements surface the questions a SaaS tool must answer
Performance marketing campaigns become live test cases for AI-driven bidding
More industries = smarter, more generalized AI.
